item.title: Localization - WordPress Plugin Development - CodeTab
item.description: 10.2.Â WordPress Plugin Localization After internationalization of the plugin, next step is to prepare language files. This process is known as Localization which consists of following steps. generate Portable Object Template (POT) file. generate Portable Object (PO) file for each language. get PO file translated by a translator. generate Machine Object (MO) file from each PO file. Install Software To generate POT file, install WordPress Tools with following commands.
